wikitext.*:
'''Certh''' is the [[Sindarin]] word for ''[[runes|rune]]''.  The plural is ''[[cirth]]''.  
==Etymology==
[[Old Sindarin]] *''kirta'', root [[KIR]] "cut"
==See also==
Words derived from ''certh'' include ''[[certhas]]'', "runic alphabet".
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]]: ''[[certa]]'' (an adaptation)
*[[Taliska]]?: ''[[skirdit]]''
*[[Westron]]: ''[[iskirde]]''

[[Category:Sindarin nouns]]
